author: Magdalena Petrova
title: Here's what life after shelter-in-place may look like in the US based on what's happening in China and South Korea
description: Following two months of draconian social distancing measures due to coronavirus, citizens in China are able go out to the mall and to get a haircut. In Wuhan, considered to be the epicenter of the pandemic, public buses and the subway are finally running agai…
content:
While many parts of the U.S. are under shelter-in-place orders in an effort to slow the spread of the coronavirus, China is beginning to ease some of the restrictions on its residents. 
Eager to resume manufacturing, many of China's factories began opening i… [+1279 chars]
